page.title: 14LEISURE AND RECREATION Pt 2
page.content: {Activities (at least) once a week: football: 2 walking: 1 sailing: 1 rugby: 1 cycling: 7 fishing: 2 cricket: 3 jogging: 2 keep fit: 1 tennis: 3 swimming: 11 yoga: 1 squash: 5 horseriding:1 aerobics: 2 badminton:2 bingo: 1 skittles: 3 theatre: 3 darts: 2 music group:6 model engineering: 1 { ******************* {Societies parents belong to:- Parent/Teacher Association: 7 Mother/Toddler Group: 6 Womens Institute: 3 Parish Council: 2 Church: 2 Choir: 1 Mothers Union: 1 Cricket Club: 2 Football Club: 3 Literary Group: 1 Rotary: 1 Bowls: 1 Gun Club: 1 Ornithology:1 { {These results are based on 42 or 72% {of surveys returned to Class 2. }
